entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning early this evening then changing to periods of snow mixed with rain near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
